name: Adversary
description: Upgrade the difficulty of any combat check targeting this character once per rank.

name: Bacta Specialist
description: Patients heal additional wounds per rank when they heal wounds from bacta tanks or long-term care.

name: Barrage
description: Add 3 to the damage of all Gunnery and Ranged attacks at Medium or Long range.

name: Black Market Contacts
description: Decrease rarity of sought item by one per rank when looking on the black market; item’s cost is increased by 50%.

name: Bypass Security
description: Remove :setback: from any Computers or Skulduggery check to bypass security.

name: Command
description: Add :boost: per rank to Leadership checks; affected targets add :boost: per rank to Discipline checks for the next 24 hours.

name: Commanding Presence
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Leadership checks.

name: Convincing Demeanor
description: Remove :setback: per rank from any Deception or Skulduggery check.

name: Crippling Blow
description: May increase damage of attack by 1. If suc­cessful, target suffers one strain when moving for remainder of encounter.

name: Deadly Accuracy
description: Adds ranks in Brawl to all damage inflicted with claws.

name: Durable
description: Subtract 10 per rank from Critical Injury rolls made against the character.

name: Expert Tracker
description: Remove :setback: from checks to find tracks or track targets; decrease time to track a target by half.

name: Feral Strength
description: +1 damage per rank on all Brawl and Melee attacks.

name: Field Commander
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; 4 allies may immediately suffer 1 strain to perform a free maneuver.

name: Gearhead
description: Remove :setback: per rank from Mechanics checks.

name: Indistinguishable
description: Opposing characters upgrade the difficulty of any checks made to identify the character once.

name: Inspiring Rhetoric
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; each :success: removes one Strain or Wound from one ally in Short range; spend :advantage: to remove an additional Strain or Wound from an affected ally.

name: Improved Inspiring Rhetoric
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; each :success: removes one Strain or Wound from one ally in Short range; spend :advantage: to remove an additional Strain or Wound from an affected ally; all affected allies add :boost: to all checks for two rounds.

name: Supreme Inspiring Rhetoric
description: As a maneuver, may make an :average: Leadership check; each :success: removes one Strain or Wound from one ally in Short range; spend :advantage: to remove an additional Strain or Wound from an affected ally; all affected allies add :boost: to all checks for four rounds.

name: Kill with Kindness
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Charm and Leadership checks.

name: Knockdown
description: May spend :triumph: to knock target prone with successful melee attack.

name: Know Somebody
description: Once per session, when attempting to purchase a legally available item, reduce its rarity by 1 per rank.

name: Lethal Blows
description: Add +10 per rank to Critical In­jury rolls against opponents.

name: Master Pilot
description: Once per round, suffer 2 Strain to perform one Pilot ac­tion as a maneuver.

name: Natural Negotiator
description: Once per session, may reroll any Cool or Negotiation check.

name: Nobody’s Fool
description: Upgrade difficulty of Charm, Coercion, and Deception checks targeting the character once per rank.

name: Plausible Deniability
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Coercion and Deception checks.

name: Point Blank
description: Add 3 damage to all Ranged (Heavy) and Ranged (Light) attacks made at Short or Engaged range.

name: Quick Draw
description: May draw or holster a weapon as an incidental.

name: Resolve
description: When suffering Strain, reduce the amount suffered by one per rank, to a minimum of 1.

name: Scathing Tirade
description: May spend an action to make an :average: Coercion check; each :success: causes one enemy in Short range to suffer 1 Strain. Spend :advantage: to cause 1 affected enemy to suffer 1 additional Strain.

name: Improved Scathing Tirade
description: As an action, may make an :average: Coercion check; each :success: inflicts 1 Strain on a target in Short range. Spend :advantage: to inflict 1 additional Strain on one affected target; all affected targets suffer :setback: to all checks for 4 rounds.

name: Sense Danger
description: Once per session, remove :setback::setback: from any check.

name: Sense Emotions
description: Add :boost: to all Charm, Coercion, and Deception checks.

name: Skilled Jockey
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Pilot checks.

name: Sniper Shot
description: Reduce difficulty of combat checks at Long or Extreme range by 1.

name: Spare Clip
description: Does not run out of ammo on :despair:.

name: Stalker
description: Add :boost: per rank to all Coordination and Stealth checks.

name: Surgeon
description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals an additional Wound per rank.

name: Uncanny Senses
description: Add :boost: per rank to all Perception checks.

name: Works Like a Charm
description: Once per session, the character may make one skill check using Presence, rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

name: Alliance Leader
description: Alliance operatives add :boost: to all Vigilance and Perception checks when in the NPC’s presence.

name: Amphibious
description: May breathe underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalties for traveling through water.

name: Awkward
description: Hutts have great physical strength but their bulk imposes severe limitations in flexibility and agility; they add :setback::setback::setback: to all Brawl, Melee, and Coordination checks they’re required to make.

name: Covering Fire
description: May spend a maneuver to add +1 ranged defense to up to three allied characters or minion groups within short range until the end of the next round; this does not stack with multiple uses.

name: Critical Eye
description: Gain :boost: on all rolls made to duplicate a familiar document.

name: Droid
description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink and can survive in vacuum or underwater; immune to poisons and toxins.

name: Destabilizing Influence
description: As a maneuver once per encounter, may add :threat: to all subsequent Cool and Discipline checks made by enemies within Medium range for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Enhanced Sense
description: Add :advantage: to any Perception checks.

name: Fire Sweep
description: As an action, a droideka can make a :hard: Gunnery check to inflict one hit that deals base damage with its built-in twin heavy blasters on up to two targets within Medium range, plus one additional target per :advantage: on the check; it can only hit each target once this way.

name: Gun Crew
description: For each Imperial Gunnery Corps member in the minion group beyond the first, reduce the Cumbersome rating of their weapons by 1.

name: Imperial Valour
description: May perform a maneuver to cause all ranged attacks targeting the character to instead hit one ally or helpless enemy in Engaged range, until the beginning of his next turn.

name: Improved Covering Fire
description: When allied minion groups within Short range perform the Covering Fire maneuver, they add +2 ranged defense instead.

name: Leader
description: All subordinates within Medium range add :boost: to all Discipline checks.

name: Light-Sensitive
description: Defel are vulnerable to bright lights, which cause them intense pain and temporary blindness if v1ewed without protection. A Defel exposed to bright light without protective goggles suffers :setback::setback: on all skill checks.

name: Ponderous
description: Hutts can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

name: Pirate Leader
description: May perform a maneuver to give orders to other pirate allies in Medium range, granting them :boost: on their next check.

name: Shadowed
description: When in darkness or deep shadow, add :boost::boost: to all Stealth checks.

name: Shield Projector
description: Maneuver to activate or deactivate; while active, gains defense 2 and upgrades the difficulty of all combat attacks targeting the droideka once, but droideka cannot use the Move maneuver.

name: Spaceport Leader
description: Spaceport staff add :boost: to all Vigilance and Perception checks when in the Spaceport Administrator’s presence.

name: Swipe
description: Spend :advantage: during melee combat to cause an engaged opponent to suffer 1 Strain.

name: Tactical Direction
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one Imperial Army minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free maneuver or add :boost: to its next check.

name: Overwhelming Fire
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one Imperial Army minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free combat check action.

name: Wookiee Rage
description: Deal +1 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks when suffering any Wounds. When suffering a Critical Injury, deal +2 damage with Brawl and Melee at­tacks instead.
